txt.en: <rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Torúglup has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Prepare to fire the central ballista. Here they come</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Azrí has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Frúzglob roars, 'You will make for good sport!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Hokarul has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'It is good you are here. The others stationed here are all out on patrol, and I fear the Enemy is stirring.'
'Prepare yourself, this battle is not yet over.'
'You have aided me greatly. They picked an excellent time to strike, while our patrols were out. Were it not for you, this forward position would have been lost.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The first assault has been defeated. You have a few moments before the second</rgb>
Rodelleth yells out, 'Incoming!'
Rodelleth yells out, 'The catapults are all down, you are on your own!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Borndol has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The second assault has been defeated. You have a few moments before the third is launched</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A patrol is moving east along the road towards Dol Guldur</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The third assault has been defeated. You have a few short moments to rest before the fourth is launched</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The fourth assault has been defeated. You have a few short moments before the fifth is launched</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The fifth assault has been defeated. The Enemy leader will soon be joining the battle! Regroup with Rodelleth quickly</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Mazaukal has been defeated. Thangúlhad is safe</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Frúzglob roars, 'I dare you to fire that weapon!'</rgb>
West Ballista
<rgb=#FF0000>Rodelleth has fallen in battle!</rgb>
Thangúlhad is being assaulted by the forces of Dol Guldur. They wish to reclaim it and eliminate the foothold the Golden Host has secured.
East Ballista
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Frúzglob has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A crash sounds to the east... the Enemy has snuck behind the line</rgb>
Rodelleth yells out, 'They destroyed a catapult!'
Rodelleth yells out, 'I need a little longer to reload!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Grudom bellows out, 'I challenge you!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Prepare to fire the west ballista. Here they come</rgb>
Defeat Mazaukal and claim the Enemy's banner
<rgb=#FF0000>Prepare to fire the east ballista. Here they come</rgb>
Rodelleth must survive the assault
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A screech erupts from the peak of the tower</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A Warg is moving west down the road away from Dol Guldur</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Azrí laughs, 'I look forward to our battle!'</rgb>
Listen to Rodelleth's orders
Talk to Rodelleth
Defeat the first assault
'We have marked the ground where the ballistae will hit when fired, make sure your timing is on.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Golugthrug has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Defeat the second assault
'This fort is an important front line position in our battle against Dol Guldur. Good luck!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A sorcerer cackles and makes a run for the tower</rgb>
Defeat the third assault
'To the walls! Let the ballista-strings sing with the death of our enemy!'
Defeat the fourth assault
<rgb=#FF0000>A roar erupts from the road to the south, the Enemy's general is on the battlefield</rgb>
'It is a great victory and one you should celebrate long. Thank you for your aid my friends.'
Defeat the fifth assault
Listen to Rodelleth
Central Ballista
Talk to Rodelleth
'Their leader is approaching... we must be very careful with this Olog-hai. The ballistae will not be enough for him.'
Rodelleth is the commanding officer at Thangúlhad. She is waiting for you to report in.
First Assault
The forces of Dol Guldur are marching against the defences of Thangúlhad. You must protect the fort and keep it secure.
Second Assault
The first assault has been defeated, but the battle is far from over.
'Thangúlhad remains in the hands of the Golden Host and Dol Guldur remains within striking.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Grudom has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Third Assault
The second assault has been defeated, but the battle is far from over.
Fourth Assault
Fifth Assault
The third assault has been defeated, their numbers are beginning to thin.
'I will go and arm the catapults... you meet him out on the road. When the catapult is about to fire, look for the signal.'
Final Assault
The fourth assault has been defeated. The Enemy is launching one final desperate assault against the walls of Thangúlhad.
'Bring him there and let their own siege-weapons do the devastation. Good fortune and try not to get hit yourself!'
'Riders! Destroy the catapults!'
The enemy leader is approaching: a fearsome Olog-hai. Rodelleth wishes to discuss the final battle-plan with you.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Azrí yells out a challenge of battle erupts from the east, 'Fire the ballista, if you dare!'</rgb>
'Come forth, champions of the Free Peoples, and greet your death!'
The enemy leader has challenged you to come and fight him outside the protection of your fortifications. Fortunately, Rodelleth is manning the catapults.
'They will come at us from the south. We have got a couple of the ballistae repaired and functional.'
The west ballista has been reloaded
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Lapus has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
The central ballista has been reloaded
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A crash sounds from the north, the rear siege-engines are being destroyed</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Ruithroval has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
The east ballista has been reloaded
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Grudom roars, 'I will smash you into pieces!'</rgb>
Protectors of Thangúlhad
'Come and let us convene quickly before the general approaches.'
